Address.Address1: Kemankec Mah Rihtie M Cad No 8 Karakoy, Istanbul

Description.Text: Hotel Hettie is a stylish 3-star superior boutique hotel offering modern accommodation in the heart of Istanbul. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining and an excellent location close to the Galata Tower and waterfront. Beyoglu is a vibrant cosmopolitan area across the Golden Horn from historic Constantinople. Traditionally home to European merchants and immigrants, it boasts many elegant Neoclassical and Art Nouveau structures. Nearby places of interest include the grand Taksim Square, medieval Galata Tower, modern art gallery Dogancay Museum and Istiklal Caddesi, a thriving street lined with cafes, bars, galleries and shops. Karakoy tram stop and ferry terminal are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 30-32sqm and individually decorated in a modern style with a light colour scheme and parquet flooring. They feature a sitting area and views of the Bosphorus. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, safe, mini-bar and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathroom feature slippers and a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a range of Turkish and international cuisine in the a-la-carte restaurant with views of the Bosphorus Strait. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. There is also a chargeable airport shuttle service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
